SAT 27 MAR 2010

JP Seafoods Conditional Jockeys´ Handicap Hurdle (CLASS 5) (4yo+ 0-95) Winner £2,602ATR
Soft 2m3f Number of runners: 12

£4,000 guaranteed For 4yo+ Rated 0-95 Weight raised 1 Minimum weight 10-0 Penalties after March 20th, each hurdle won 7lb Wham Bang's Handicap Mark 94 Allowances riders who, prior to March 24th, 2010, have not ridden more than 20 winners under any Rules of Racing 3lb; more than 10 such winners 5lb; any such winner 7lb; riders riding for own stable an additional 3lb Entries 29 pay £ 20 Penalty value 1st £2,602.00 2nd £764.00 3rd £382.00 4th £190.80
